All these thoughts terrified you, and you didn't want to take any chances with this titanic toddler. Turning around, you quickly began to run as far away from her as you could, but your escape was cut short as you felt the girl's pudgy young fingers wrapping around your body. As she lifted you up into the air and dangled you in front of her face, you realized just how helpless you truly were.

"Where do you think you're going, little guy? Don't you want to play with me?" She asked, grinning ear to ear.

The smile on her face was enough for you to tell exactly what she was planning. You could tell just by looking at it that...
143.title: Your BIG encounter with a little girl

choices: Refuse; make her help you get back to normal
You took too long deciding what to do, and her friend approaches
1431.content:
Luckily, this girl seemed nice, and her smile was very kind-looking. She probably wouldn't intentionally hurt you, but seeing as she was just around four years old and currently giant compared to you, you were not sure if she'd hurt you on accident. At the moment, though, she was acting gentle, not squeezing you too hard or anything. She raised the hand not currently holding you and gently patted your head, showing that she meant no harm.

"Well?" she asked. "Do you wanna play?"

"Um... not exactly," you said. "I'd like to figure out how I got so small, and get back to normal size."

"Awww..." the girl said, pouting. "But you're just like a little doll! I wanna play with you! We'll be friends, okay?"

You stared into the young giantess' eyes, finding it hard to resist her pouty face. On the one hand, she seemed nice, although she thought you're a toy, and probably wouldn't try to harm you. Plus, you thought, it might be fun to play with a giant girl. It's certainly an experience you never thought you'd have. On the other hand, she was giant and certainly strong enough to hurt or even kill you, and you didn't like the idea of being at her mercy should she treat you more as a doll instead of a human. So, you had to make a choice: play along with her, or refuse and insist she help you figure out how to get back to normal?
1431.title: She's nice, and wants to become friends

14311.content:
You nod and put on a smile, despite the dangerous situation you're in.

"Okay, I'll play with you. But only if you promise me something, okay? Make sure you don't hurt me, and don't play too long. I don't want to stay like thi8s forever, and I'd like to figure out how to get back to my normal size as soon as I can. Okay?"

The girl nods quickly, grinning widely and clearly very happy to have you agree with her. You just hope she was actually listening to what you said. She brings up the hand not holding you and clasps it around the hand that is holding you, getting a firmer grip on you by using both her hands, and begins to run down the hallway towards a door outside.

She pushed it open, and you're momentarily unable to see from the bright outside light. When you recover, you see a big playground are with lots of kids playing on it, and a few adults standing nearby to supervise. It must be recess for the kids, and you note that might be better than it being classtime--it would be harder to stay hidden in an enclosed room full of kids.

The girl, luckily for you, heads away from the other kids and goes towards a part of the playground with some random toys and things scattered around. This must be where random toys are kept when not in use. The girl walks into the middle of the place and sets you down, crouching to get closer so she can talk to you quietly.

"Okay, here's what we're gonna do! I'll count down and you'll hide! Try not to get found!"

The girl covers her eyes and starts counting down. You immediately begin looking for a hiding spot, and have two options close enough to reach.

Obviously, you should focus on getting back to normal. Being a few inches tall and surrounded by children is not a good situation to be in. Being here for long would be dangerous, so you need to get out. As interesting a situation as this is, you know it's not a good one to be in. Though it might even be fun, this is no way to live. You need to get out of here, now.

Assuming it's not just random chance or magic, perhaps there was something scientific involved? A science experiment gone wrong somewhere in the school that ended up somehow shrinking you as part of its effects doesn't seem impossible. Whatever caused this, though, you can't think about too long, because the girl is getting closer to the blocks. You hide in the pile more, hoping she won't find you. The young blonde giantess crouches down in front of the blocks, and you know she'll spot you now. She looks at the pile, noticing the hole before long and seeing your 3-inch tall form inside. She grins widely and giggles, pointing at you.

"Found you!" she says happily.

You sigh and climb out of the pile, only to be quickly and roughly snatched up by the girl's pudgy fingers. She raises you up to her face and smiles.

"Hey, that was easy!" she says. "I thought you'd be tough to find, but I found you! Sure you didn't want to be found?"

You're about to say yes, but you're actually not sure. Did you really want to not be found? Stay alone, without these giants, or allow them to have their way with you? With them, it would be dangerous and potentially very bad, but potentially also safe and even fun. On your own, it would be hard... but you'd be free, and able to do your own things. Even now, this girl several times younger than you was holding you in a single clenched fist, completely preventing your movement. She had so much power over you. Was that something you wanted?

The girl notices your silence while you thought, and gently squeezes you to snap you out of it. When she notices you focus on her, she smiles gently and worriedly.

"Hey, you alright?" she asks. "You looked... kinda weird for a bit."

You sigh. You think it's time for you to say what's on your mind. Or is it?

Though you weren't certain how readily you yet accepted it, you knew deep down you had no power here. As far as kids were concerned, large meant in-charge, and you were none without the other.

Despite that thought, you're not sure you could bring yourself to say no to the tyke, even if she didn't have you wrapped in her soft but iron grip. Despite its immensity, her face shone with innocence; her massive brown eyes curious and gentle, complimenting her smile. She reminded you of your own sisters at her age, how fun it was to indulge in their attention, and how they always looked to you for... Just about anything. Though the perspective was slightly skewed, you never realized just how strong your nostalgia was for those times.

"...You know what? This is fun, let's keep playing! But something other than hide-and-seek, you're too good for me!"

She closed her eyes and smiled wide, happy with what she was hearing.

"You're the best, lil' guy! Mwah!"

With zero warning your head is pulled into her puckered pink lips, pushing you into the plush, warm flesh. As she held you there, a massive burst of cool air rushed down over you from her nostrils, and you were once again reminded at just how small you really were now.

With a "pop!" she pulled you away, blushing lightly, but mercifully too small for her to see. As she massaged your puny form, she once again rushed you into her, but this time you felt your entire front being rubbed against a soft, slightly rubbery surface. Heat radiated into you, and you could hear the sound of rushing water on the other side of the thick, fleshy wall. The stimulation was remarkable, it felt as though your entirety was being washed away, completely diminished by her superior size, despite her massively inferior age.

Pulling you away, she once again smiled down on you.

"I'm so glad I found you! We're gonna play together forever!"

The words were ominous, but the voice carrying them was nothing but innocent.

"Ooh ooh, that's right, what game you wanna play?"

14313.content:
The choice was hard to make. If you decided to obey your gigantic captor, you could not only survive, but potentially even have some fun. Getting the chance to play with a giant young girl isn't an opprotunity most people would get to do. But at the same time, this wasn't a mature giant whose palm he was being held in - this was a very young and immature child. At her size, she could crush you with the nail of her pinkie finger without even trying. You stood straight up and scratched your chin, evaluating your choices as the "little" girl stretched her palm out to give you some space. However, despite this, she still looked at you in the same ways, with her gigantic beady eyes and her innocent smile. Finally, after a few minutes, you made up your mind. You decided that you would play with her. With this, you smile and wave up to her. In response, she reeled her palm back in and began to speak.

"So, little guy, whaddya pi-" She asked before being suddenly interrupted by something.

You were shocked out of your mind when suddenly, her body tipped over. Her hands came loose as you were left helplessly falling, looking forward as the giantess began to fall tummy-first onto the grass. You looked down, scared out of your mind of falling to your death.

"A-Ammy!!" You heard a girl's voice cry out, though the tone was of an ever so slightly lower pitch.

Your eyes, however, suddenly widened as you looked down to see the gigangtic palm once again. Landing on the hand, you rattled on your back as the girl crashed onto the ground on her belly. She held you out in her hands below her face and looked back at you with a goofy smile before plopping you into her left hand and picking herself up using her right, which you were in formerly. Once on her feet, she pressed you and her left hand to her left thigh, covering all of you but your head in her gargantuan fingers.

"A-Amanda, are you OK?!" The female voice from before called out to her.

She turned around and saw who had accidentally caused her to fall on the ground, a girl her age of whom she considered her best friend.

You, covered still in the titanic hand, look forward to see the second young girl. For her age, she seemed a bit taller than most her age, standing a head above the reasonably average sized girl holding you - not that either were of "normal" high from your point of view. Her hair was dark brown and flowed down a fair deal behind her back. Her body was extremely skinny and fragile, and she wore a sweater with white and beige horizontal stripes, along with a bright green skirt. Her face seemed even more cute and innocent than her friend's. You still couldn't believe that these normally adorable little girls were now giants. Most movies make giants out to be slow and tardy, but the girls were just as gleeful and energetic as they would be at their normal size.

"H-huh? No, I'm alright, Holly, don't worry-"

Her statements weren't enough to stop her friend as she wrapped her arms around her and embraced her in a tight hug. You tried your absolute best as you were shoved into this girl, apparently named Holly,'s bare leg.

"I'm so sorryyyyyyyy, I shouldn't have, it was an accident-"

The girl who had just previously saved you from becoming a red stain in the dirt, apparently named Amanda, cut Holly off.

"It's ok, really!"

Holly, satisfied, let go of her friend with a smile. Through the whole embrace, Amanda had never once let go of you.

"H-hey, but Holly, I have something super duper cool to show you!:

Holly's eyes lit up upon hearing this.

"Ooh, really? Where is it? Can I see it?!"

As the fingers surrounding you twitched, you braced yourself.

"Here it is.."

And in a split second, the fingers recolied and the palm that you stood on was swung forward right in front of the curious young girl's eyes.

"..feast your eyes!"

The girl stood, completely confused, for a few seconds.

"Uh.. is this a dollie?'

Amanda was confused for a moment, but after realizing that he wasn't doing anything, she gave her palm a slight shake as a signal.

"No, it's a real tiny man! Like a dollie, but living!"

You thought about it for a split second. You were like some sort of lab rat - but you still found it quite fun to indulge in these young girls' escapades, so you decided to play along. As soon as Holly heard her words and looked down at you again, you waved up at her. After seeing this, her eyes widened as she moved a bit closer to Amanda's palm to observe the tiny specimen. She stared in pure shock for a seemingly long amount of time, until she finally spoke up.

"...D'AWWWWWW! He's adooooorable! He's so cute, I could just eat him right up!"

This remark scared you once again - after all, it served as a passive reminder that that was something she could do if she really wanted to. Amanda nodded in response, causing Holly to speak up once again.

"So, what are you - or, uh, we gonna do with him?"

Amanda smiled and spoke.

"Well, we're gonna-"

Another voice suddenly kicked in. The deep voice of an adult man.

"GIRLS, COME IN THIS INSTANT! CLASS IS ABOUT TO START!"

The two sighed. Before they ran back to class, Amanda finally said..

"We'll play with him later..
